name: Laundry Boy
description:
You are playing a laundry boy in a nuclear factory! 

Your goal is to collect as many laundry as you can -> wash it with the machine -> and return it to the factory clean and fresh!

Be aware that your contamination level doesn't reach to 100% or you will die! 

Contaminated laundry gain more radiosity as time goes by!

For each laundry piece collected you get points!

For each clean laundry piece returned you get more points!

Only keyboard arrows! 

Good luck!
